divs: Sighting DetailsMy female companion and I were vacationing in Paris and decided to go to the Sacre Coeur cathedral, which is up on a hill and provides a nice panoramic view of Paris. A few minutes before, I had commented that I had not seen any planes flying over Paris while we were there. When I took the shot, I saw nothing unusual in the camera and neither me nor my friend heard any noise. She took a similar photo with a conventional SLR film camera, but zoomed in more to downtown Paris. If you look in the foreground, no one is looking up, as they would have if a plane were flying so low and so nearby. Later, back at our hotel, we were looking through the shots we had taken that day and saw the object in the photo.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Paris

This sighting has never been favorited.
